name: atomized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
consisting of separate parts that do not have much contact with each other: In our increasingly atomized society, more and more people live alone.
(of a liquid) in the form of very small drops: The canisters were found to contain atomized sarin, a deadly poison.
